comment:
Set fridge @54F, and chilled 75F wort for 3 hours before pitching 1.5L starter with extra vial WLP800 (~300billon cells).
Thick krausen seen 3hours after pitching. After 72 hours, will warm up to 65F for diacytal rest for 24 hours, and crash at 42F. 
http://www.whitelabs.com/yeast/wlp800-pilsner-lager-yeast
